MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA13 area of Kilwinning, affecting properties in Bruntsfield Avenue and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm due to a fault on our underground electricity network near the Bruntsfield Avenue substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:43pm on Sunday, 25 October 2020
